next.excerpt:
Thanks to GreenChef for sponsoring this video!
For $90 off across your first 5 Green Chef boxes, go to https://www.GreenChef.us/brianmd90 and enter code brianmd90!

Conor McGregor was knocked out by Dustin Poirier at UFC 257 after a flurry of brutal leg kicks caused McGregor's leg to go dead and weak. Poirier ultimately won by knockout to defeat McGregor, but the leg kicks were really the star of the show to help give Poirier the victory. In this video we'll review the leg kicks and explain the anatomy that makes them so effective in MMA!

EDIT 4:45, these are NOT dermatomes. Dermatomes come from the spinal nerve root levels, these are just the distributions from sensory peripheral nerves.


UFC and Boxing Videos:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrdpldKEF236khwdFNRilNeOZded9gZLD

MY MUSIC:
Epidemic Sound - Sign up with this link for a FREE 30 day trial!
https://www.epidemicsound.com/referral/2m1bb5/

Follow Me on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/b_sutterer

I'm a doctor and a sports fan and this channel is dedicated to exploring the unique medical side of the world of sports, including NBA, MLB, NFL, UFC, and many more! Breaking down the biggest what ifs, historical injuries and stories, and making learning about medicine fun and relevant for all sports fans!

Anatomy images: https://www.biodigital.com

DISCLAIMER: Content not intended to be taken as medical advice. Opinions are my own and do not represent those of my employer. I have not personally treated or evaluated the individual(s) discussed in this video. Content used with educational and transformative intent within Fair Use Guidelines
Content owned and produced by Brian Sutterer LLC 2021
next.title: Conor McGregor's DEAD LEG Leads to Knockout at UFC 257 - Doctor Explains BRUTAL Leg Kicks!

localize.title: 康纳-麦格雷戈(Conor McGregor)在UFC 257的比赛中因腿部死亡导致被击倒--医生解释BRUTAL腿部踢法!
localize.description:
感谢GreenChef赞助这个视频!
如果您想在前5个GreenChef盒子中获得90美元的优惠，请访问https://www.GreenChef.us/brianmd90，并输入代码brianmd90!

康纳-麦格雷戈（Conor McGregor）在UFC257比赛中被达斯汀-波里耶（Dustin Poirier）击倒，一连串残忍的腿踢导致麦格雷戈的腿部无力，被击倒。Poirier最终以击倒的方式战胜了麦格雷戈，但腿踢确实是帮助Poirier取得胜利的明星。在这段视频中，我们将回顾腿部踢法，并解释使它们在MMA中如此有效的解剖学!

EDIT 4:45，这些都不是真皮体。皮质体来自脊神经根水平，这些只是来自感觉外周神经的分布。


UFC和拳击视频。
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrdpldKEF236khwdFNRilNeOZded9gZLD

我的音乐。
Epidemic Sound - 使用此链接注册，即可获得30天免费试用!
https://www.epidemicsound.com/referral/2m1bb5/

在Twitter上关注我
https://twitter.com/b_sutterer

我是一名医生，同时也是一名体育迷，这个频道致力于探索体育界独特的医疗方面，包括NBA、MLB、NFL、UFC等等。剖析最大的万一，历史上的伤病和故事，让所有体育迷学习医学知识变得有趣而有意义!

解剖图片：https://www.biodigital.com

免责声明：内容不打算作为医疗建议。意见是我自己的，不代表我的雇主的意见。我没有亲自治疗或评估本视频中讨论的个人。在公平使用准则范围内，以教育和变革为目的使用的内容。
内容由Brian Sutterer LLC 2021拥有和制作。
